thread.title: Did Apple pick the right or wrong time for new Apple TV?
thread.title_full: Did Apple pick the right or wrong time for new Apple TV? - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: Did Apple pick the right or wrong time for new Apple TV?
text:
Photo: Apple print_article_embed|photo-8010624|article-6484157|7 comments_jump_embed|photo-8010624|article-6484157|1 email_share_embed|photo-8010624|article-6484157|1 facebook_share_embed|photo-8010624|article-6484157|2 twitter_share_embed|photo-8010624|article-6484157|3 pinterest_share_embed|photo-8010624|article-6484157|4 reddit_share_embed|photo-8010624|article-6484157|5 google_share_embed|photo-8010624|article-6484157|6 Apple wants the Apple TV, the company's set-top box, to be the hub for compatible smart devices for the home. A new version of Apple TV is rumored to be in the works for a Wednesday, Sept. 9 event in San Francisco. Apple wants the Apple TV, the company's set-top box, to be the hub...
Apple could be picking the right time, or the wrong time, to introduce a reimagined Apple TV. Apple wants the Apple TV, the company's set-top box, to be the hub for compatible smart devices for the home. A new version of Apple TV is rumored to be in the works for a Wednesday, Sept. 9 event in San Francisco. Apple wants the Apple TV, the company's set-top box, to be the hub...
Apple could be picking the right time, or the wrong time, to introduce a reimagined Apple TV.
